author: Lia Lévesque, La Presse Canadienne
title: Les ingénieurs du gouvernement déclencheront une grève illimitée le 2 mai | L'actualité
text:
MONTRÉAL — Les 2050 ingénieurs du gouvernement du Québec accroissent la pression: ils vont déclencher une grève illimitée à compter du 2 mai.
D’ici là, ils poursuivent la grève de soir, de nuit et de fin de semaine qu’ils ont déjà amorcée, a indiqué en entrevue, vendredi, Marc-André Martin, président de l’Association professionnelle des ingénieurs du gouvernement du Québec (APIGQ).
Ces ingénieurs travaillent aux ministères des Transports — 1200 d’entre eux — de l’Environnement, des Ressources naturelles, par exemple. Ils délivrent des permis et s’occupent de la planification de chantiers.
Le président de l’APIGQ maintient que Québec n’offre pas véritablement aux ingénieurs du gouvernement la même «enveloppe budgétaire» que celle qu’il a accordée à l’ensemble des employés de l’État.
La présidente du Conseil du trésor, Sonia LeBel, assure que le gouvernement a bel et bien offert aux ingénieurs des augmentations de salaire de l’ordre de 17,4 % sur cinq ans, comme ce qui a été accordé aux autres employés de l’État.
«Une proposition globale de règlement, incluant le +17,4 % tel que convenu avec 98 % des autres syndicats publics, a été déposée le 8 janvier 2025», a indiqué la ministre.
M. Martin rétorque qu’en plus des augmentations salariales de 17,4 %, les employés de l’État ont obtenu un autre montant, qui équivaut selon lui à 7 ou 8 %, pour les assurances, des congés, des primes et autres – ce qui n’a pas été offert aux ingénieurs.
Il rapporte donc que ses membres «ont le sentiment que le gouvernement s’obstine à nous donner moins que les autres».
«Ce qu’on demande, nous, c’est ni plus ni moins la même chose que les autres, pas plus, pas moins. On veut avoir accès à ces mêmes enveloppes-là», insiste le dirigeant syndical.
«Nous, on n’est pas pressé de signer un mauvais règlement. Hier, on a eu une assemblée; les gens sont derrière nous. On leur a dit: écoutez, c’est pas vrai qu’on va laisser de l’argent sur la table; c’est pas vrai qu’on va signer en bas des autres groupes», a rapporté M. Martin.
Le mandat de grève a été appuyé à 87,9 %, avec un taux de participation de 85,5 %, souligne-t-il.
Il reste donc un mois aux parties pour s’entendre sur le renouvellement de la convention collective avant l’extension de la grève.
Vendredi matin, aucune autre séance de négociation n’était prévue. Mais M. Martin se dit prêt à négocier n’importe quand. «Nos téléphones sont ouverts.»
Mercredi dernier, soit avant que l’avis de grève soit transmis, la ministre LeBel écrivait sur X: «négos avec les ingénieurs: avec les chantiers qui s’en viennent au Québec, on peut régler rapidement avec l’APIGQ».
Dans le cas d’une grève des ingénieurs, des services essentiels sont prévus, afin d’assurer la santé et la sécurité du public. M. Martin précise que 350 ingénieurs y sont affectés.

author: ABP News Bureau
title: Karnataka Passes Bill To Empower Govt To Collect 10% Tax From Temples Over Rs 1 Cr Revenue, Row Erupts
text: While BJP leader portrayed this levy as government's plan to "gobble up" temple revenue, Siddaramaiah slammed Vijayendra for hurling allegations to mislead and polarise people along communal lines. On the bill, Minister Ramalinga Reddy said, "We are not anti-Hindu. Actually, BJP is anti-Hindu...This Act came into existence in 2003. In 2011, they made some amendments...At that time, upto Rs 5 Lakhs there were about 34,000 temples - they did not give any money for Dharmika Parishad." "From Rs 5 Lakhs to Rs 10 Lakhs, there are about 193 'B grade' temples - they have to give 5%. More than Rs 10 Lakhs, there are about 205 temples - they have to give 10% ---- They approved this amendment in 2011 in the Assembly. Who is anti-Hindu? BJP...In the interest of the most neglected 'C grade' temples in Karnataka...if I give Rs 2-3 Lakhs, they can repair, reconstruct. This is the idea," he said. — ANI (@ANI) [#WATCH]| Karnataka Govt passed 'Karnataka Hindu Religious Institutions and Charitable Endowments Bill 2024' that empowers the govt to collect 10% tax from temples that have revenues exceeding Rs 1 crore & 5% from those with revenues ranging between Rs 10 lakh & Rs 1 crore.… [pic.twitter.com/rnnzLestzA] [February 23, 2024] ALSO READ: ABP Network Ideas Of India Summit 3.0 Is Here! 8 Reasons You Should Not Miss It Karnataka News on abp LIVE for more latest stories and trending topics. author: Erick Acevedo Maya
title: Trabajadores de Boeing rechazan oferta salarial e inician huelga
text: Trabajadores de Boeing rechazan oferta salarial e inician huelga Jon Holden, presidente del sindicato IAM, señaló que es una “huelga por prácticas laborales injustas” Al menos 35 mil empleados de la empresa fabricante de aeronaves comerciales, Boeing, abandonaron sus puestos e iniciaron este viernes una huelga en la región de Seattle, tras votar por mayoría en contra de una oferta de contrato propuesta por la misma empresa y la Asociación Internacional de Mecánicos y Trabajadores del Sector Aeroespacial (IAM). La huelga, que comenzó a las 00:01 de la mañana (hora del Pacífico), es la primera en 16 años en la compañía estadounidense. Jon Holden, presidente del sindicato International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM, por sus siglas en inglés) Distrito 751, señaló que “se rechazó un acuerdo propuesto por Boeing con un 94.6% de los votos y se aprobó la huelga con un 96%”. Dicha oferta prometía un aumento salarial del 25% en cuatro años, misma que los empleados calificaron como “engañosa”, pues, con dicho incremento, la empresa eliminaría un “bono anual” que daba a los trabajadores, con lo que el supuesto “aumento salarial” solo subía un 9%. Te puede interesar Holden calificó la protesta como una “huelga por prácticas laborales injustas”, en la que se lucha contra actos de “conducta discriminatoria, interrogatorio coercitivo, vigilancia ilegal y promesa ilegal de beneficios”. Finalizó diciendo contundentemente: “Iniciamos la huelga a la medianoche”. Por su parte, la recién nombrada CEO, Kelly Ortberg, justo antes de iniciar la votación, advirtió que la huelga pondría “en peligro la recuperación” y añadió que “nadie gana con una huelga”. Según analistas aeronáuticos de TD Cowen, si la huelga se extiende por 30 días, las afectaciones económicas a Boeing podrían ascender entre 3 mil y 3 mil 500 millones de dólares en liquidez, con un impacto de 5 mil 500 millones de dólares en los ingresos. Además, la protesta afecta a dos de las más grandes plantas de ensamblaje en Renton y Everett, en Washington, lo que detendría la producción de los aviones 737, 777 y 767, cuyas entregas ya están retrasadas. El grupo Boeing señaló, a través de un comunicado, que se encuentran “comprometidos” con las negociaciones. “Seguimos comprometidos con restablecer nuestra relación con nuestros empleados y el sindicato, y estamos listos para volver a la mesa de negociaciones para llegar a un nuevo acuerdo”, indicó la empresa.

author: DrLucienSanchez Community Member
title: Re: Sleep automation media repeating.
text:
Saturday
Hi, hoping for some help.
I use the sleep automation to play rain noise, it should be an hour long and then stop, however it keeps defaulting to single track repeat and never stops. I turn this off in the home app once it's playing but it will go back to this the next time I use the sleep automation.
13m ago
Hey DrLucienSanchez,
I apologize for the delayed response. I understand how important it is to be able to enjoy different relaxing tracks on your Google Nest Mini. To help resolve the issue, could you please provide me with some additional details? When did you first notice the issue? Is the issue also present when you attempt to play relaxing sounds on your Nest Mini via voice command? Also, I would like to know which actions have been added to your routine.
In the meantime, I recommend creating a new routine with the same actions and testing to see if the issue persists. This will help us to isolate the issue and find a solution that works for you.
Looking forward to your response.
Cheers,
Muddi

author: Элина Закирова
title: Рыбак погиб от удара молнии на берегу озера
text:
На берегу озера в поселке Березовая Грива Кемеровской области в результате удара молнии погиб мужчина. Об этом сообщили РИА Новости в пресс-службе Кузбасского центра медицины катастроф.
Уточняется, что погибший в момент трагедии рыбачил на озере. Другие детали произошедшего, а также информация о возможных пострадавших среди остальных людей, находившихся на берегу, не сообщается.

author: Franklin Goodwin
title: Matt Redman Net Worth - Net Worth FAQ (2024 Edition)
text:
Contents
Matt Redman Net Worth: A Look at the Life and Legacy of the Christian Worship Artist What is Matt Redman’s Net Worth and Salary? Early Life and Education Career Personal Life Real Estate Legacy FAQs 1. What are some of Matt Redman’s biggest hits? 2. What has Matt Redman said about his songwriting process? 3. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted the Christian music scene? 4. What awards has Matt Redman won throughout his career? 5. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted the lives of his fans? 6. What is Matt Redman’s approach to leading worship? 7. How has Matt Redman’s music evolved over the years? 8. How does Matt Redman balance his music career with family life? 9. What advice does Matt Redman have for aspiring worship leaders? 10. How has Matt Redman inspired other worship leaders? 11. What is Matt Redman’s involvement with the Passion Conferences? 12. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted Christian worship outside of the United States? 13. What role does Matt Redman believe worship music plays in the church? 14. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted non-Christians? 15. How does Matt Redman balance commercial success with spiritual authenticity? Matt Redman Net Worth: A Look at the Life and Legacy of the Christian Worship Artist When it comes to worship music, Matt Redman is a name that cannot be ignored. With numerous chart-topping albums and hit singles, Redman has established himself as one of the most successful Christian music artists of all time. But what is Matt Redman’s net worth? How did he succeed in the music industry? In this article, we will take a closer look at the life, career, and legacy of Matt Redman.
What is Matt Redman’s Net Worth and Salary? According to Celebrity Net Worth, Matt Redman’s net worth is estimated to be around $7 million. He earns his income from various sources including album sales, concerts, and collaborations with other artists in the industry. As a successful Christian music artist, Redman has won multiple awards for his work, including two Grammy Awards.
Early Life and Education Matt Redman was born on February 14th, 1974, in Watford, England. He grew up in a family that was heavily involved in church and music, which played a significant role in his early musical development. Redman started playing the guitar as a teenager and began leading worship at his local church when he was just 15 years old.
He later attended St. John’s College in Nottingham, where he studied theology and music. During his studies, Redman became more involved in the worship music scene and started to gain recognition for his songwriting abilities.
Career Matt Redman’s music career took off in the late 1990s when he started releasing albums and touring full-time. In 1998, he released his first album, “Wake Up My Soul,” which featured hits like “I Will Offer Up My Life” and “The Father’s Song.” This album set the foundation for Redman’s career as a successful Christian music artist.
Over the years, Redman has produced numerous albums, including “Blessed Be Your Name” (2005), “10,000 Reasons” (2011), and his latest album “Let There Be Wonder” (2020). He has also collaborated with various artists in the industry such as Chris Tomlin, Hillsong United, and Tasha Cobbs-Leonard.
Personal Life Matt Redman is married to Beth Redman, who is also a worship leader and songwriter. Together, they have five children and reside in Brighton, England. In addition to his music career, Redman is also an author, having written several books, including “The Unquenchable Worshipper” and “Facedown.”
Real Estate Matt Redman’s real estate portfolio includes a house in Brighton, England, where he currently resides with his family. He also owns a vacation home in the United States.
Legacy As a Christian music artist, Matt Redman’s legacy extends far beyond his music. He is known for his commitment to leading people in worship and inspiring others to deepen their faith. His music has touched the lives of millions of people around the world and continues to be a source of encouragement and inspiration for many.
Redman’s influence on the worship music scene has been recognized by numerous organizations, and he has received various awards for his contributions to the industry. His impact on the Christian music genre is undoubtedly significant and will continue to be felt for years to come.
FAQs 1. What are some of Matt Redman’s biggest hits? Matt Redman has released numerous hit singles over the years, including “10,000 Reasons,” “Blessed Be Your Name,” “The Father’s Song,” and “Heart of Worship.”
2. What has Matt Redman said about his songwriting process? In an interview with Worship Musician Magazine, Redman shared that he writes songs specifically for congregational worship. He focuses on creating melodies and lyrics that are easy to sing and that connect with people on a deeper level.
3. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted the Christian music scene? Matt Redman’s music has played a significant role in the evolution of modern worship music. He has inspired countless artists and helped shape the sound of contemporary Christian music.
4. What awards has Matt Redman won throughout his career? Matt Redman has won multiple awards throughout his career, including two Grammy Awards, a GMA Dove Award, and a Stellar Award.
5. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted the lives of his fans? Matt Redman’s music has touched the lives of millions of people around the world. Many fans credit his music with helping them deepen their faith and find hope in difficult times.
6. What is Matt Redman’s approach to leading worship? Matt Redman is known for his approach to leading worship, which emphasizes the importance of authenticity and vulnerability. He believes that worship is about connecting with God on a personal level and encouraging others to do the same.
7. How has Matt Redman’s music evolved over the years? Matt Redman’s music has evolved over the years, reflecting changes in his personal life, as well as changes in the worship music scene. His latest album, “Let There Be Wonder,” features a more stripped-back sound that emphasizes the power of simple, heartfelt worship.
8. How does Matt Redman balance his music career with family life? Matt Redman has spoken about the challenges of balancing his music career with family life. He prioritizes spending time with his wife and children and tries to limit his touring schedule to minimize time away from home.
9. What advice does Matt Redman have for aspiring worship leaders? Matt Redman advises aspiring worship leaders to focus on their relationship with God and prioritize authenticity in their worship. He encourages them to draw from their personal experiences and write songs that connect with people on a deeper level.
10. How has Matt Redman inspired other worship leaders? Matt Redman’s approach to worship has inspired countless other worship leaders to prioritize authenticity and vulnerability in their music. He has helped shape the sound of modern worship music and encouraged others to connect with God on a deeper level.
11. What is Matt Redman’s involvement with the Passion Conferences? Matt Redman has been involved with the Passion Conferences since the early 2000s. He has performed at numerous Passion events and collaborated with other artists to create music for the conferences.
12. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted Christian worship outside of the United States? Matt Redman’s music has had a significant impact on Christian worship around the world. His songs are sung in churches across the globe, and he has collaborated with artists from various countries to create music that reflects the diversity of the global church.
13. What role does Matt Redman believe worship music plays in the church? Matt Redman believes that worship music plays a vital role in the church, helping to connect people with God on a personal level and inspiring them to deeper faith. He sees worship music as a tool for building community and fostering unity among believers.
14. How has Matt Redman’s music impacted non-Christians? Matt Redman’s music has touched the lives of many non-Christians, who have been drawn to the honesty and vulnerability in his lyrics. His music has been used in secular media, including TV shows and movies, providing a platform for his message of hope and faith.
15. How does Matt Redman balance commercial success with spiritual authenticity? Matt Redman is committed to maintaining spiritual authenticity in his music despite his commercial success. He prioritizes connecting with God on a personal level and creating music that reflects that connection. He believes that success in the music industry should never come at the expense of spiritual integrity.
